Project PHP

2020 - 2021

Semester 2

View the result

For the course 'Project PHP' me and my team (KM-B) made a webapplication for the swimming pool of our client.

In the course 'Requirement Analysis' we made a prototype with documentation for another client (teacher) his/her project. We got documentation from the other groups and a conversation with the client to make sure we knew what the application should be. The 'Scrum' projectstructure was a challenge in the beginning of the project, but after some time we figured it out so we could track the progress of the project very easily.

As 'Scrum Leader' I made sure the startup of the project was being done correct. I set up the initial projectfiles, made the correct structure + a 'to-do' list on Jira. Ofcourse I worked on the project itself aswell. In terms of functional pages I made the homepage for admin/teacher, FAQ page and swimminglesson & swimmingparty-timestamps management page.

Page layout is something that is important to me, so I've spent quite a bit of time at it on this project.
